column4: ok, so no one has any idea why Ubuntu 11.04 would fail to install grub when w7 is present?
to many partitions, no free space a gpt partition schema.
plenty of free space, doesn't seem to be too many partitions. gpt is a possibility.
not sure that is a geeks area.
hey; so it was an MBR partition table with efi, which is apparently an unhappy combo. the solution is to install grub-pc.
